EmailTemplate.name: 2015 April Newsletter 2 (English)
EmailTemplate.subject: Africa's Iconic Safari Destination, Tanzania
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Africa's greatest icon,Tanzania
Hello {!Lead.FirstName},
I’m writing to you from our buzzing Cape Town offices, next to me are my packed bags. This month I'll be heading out to Tanzania. Joining me will be a specially selected group from our team. Together we’ll be exploring all the must-see sights, lodges and surrounds. We do this every year so we can provide you with priceless insight.
You can look forward to several exciting announcements
In the meantime have a peek at what we’ve been up to below. You’ll also find 2 Tanzania tours, hand-crafted by yours truly. I look forward to welcoming you to Africa soon.
~ Marcus Brain, Safari365 founder ~
You can view it online by clicking here >>>[webversionurl]
Safari365 Old Marine Dr Foreshore, Cape Town, 8000, South Africa www.safari365.com
